Ok, so I got the audio working.  I redownloaded the file, but there was still no audio.  I had to remux the bloody thing as there was something in the original encoding causing the audio not to play.

For u guys havin a problem like "file doesn't wanna play" the problem is the name of the folder is too long. So all u need to do is to change it when u open the torrent with utorrent for example.
